entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , La Loche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:38 AM CST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 9.

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 5.
